subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Ellis Hobbs, the Patriots’ 5-foot-9 cornerback, was Manning’s nemesis in the regular-season finale and again proved a thorn in the side of the Giants quarterback in Super Bowl XLII.
snippet: Ellis Hobbs, the Patriots’ 5-foot-9 cornerback, was Manning’s nemesis in the regular-season finale and again proved a thorn in the side of the Giants quarterback in Super Bowl XLII.
